sections.text:
66-304.State plan; submit to Legislature.

Upon submitting a state plan to the United States Environmental Protection Agency, the Department of Water, Energy, and Environment shall electronically submit to the Legislature a copy of the state plan.

SourceLaws 2015, LB469, § 4;Laws 2019, LB302, § 74;Laws 2025, LB317, § 359.Operative Date: July 1, 2025
